channel.title: ||Client NPC's||
channel.description:
Hey, okay i got my server up and I'm using a client, everything works fine, but when i attack an NPC it glitches loggs out keeps your account logged in and if anyone can help me add zomg_pat@hotmail.com i'll give you admin when my server is up and running.
thanks
-Pat
